title: I See My Colors
subtle: Concept (fiction), 24 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR60L
description: What colors might you see on a picnic in spring? I See My Colors features imaginative illustrations that highlight the featured color on each page. Students have the opportunity to identify the setting as well as visualize as they read this simple book about colors. Detailed illustrations, high-frequency words, and repetitive phrases support early emergent readers.
meta: blue, brown, gold, green, orange, pink, purple, red
Use the reading strategy of visualizing to understand text
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /p/ sound
Concept Words : identify and write color words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
